thread.title: 2nd suspect in fatal shooting, robbery at Denver light rail station arrested – The Denver Post
thread.title_full: 2nd suspect in fatal shooting, robbery at Denver light rail station arrested – The Denver Post

author: Kieran Nicholson
title: 2nd suspect in fatal shooting, robbery at Denver light rail station arrested – The Denver Post
text: Babysitter who tried to rob bank with kids in backseat sentenced to 6 years in prison February 10, 2017, 3:24 pm A babysitter accused of robbing a bank with children in the backseat of her car will likely spend the next six years in prison after pleading guilty Friday to three charges in two separate cases. Youth corrections officer in Colorado Springs arrested, accused of assault, child abuse in incident with inmate February 10, 2017, 4:55 pm A corrections officer at a juvenile facility in Colorado Springs has been arrested on suspicion of second-degree assault and child abuse in connection with a September incident with an inmate. Mesa County deputies find 14 pounds of heroin in car with Californians February 10, 2017, 11:01 am Authorities in Mesa County on Tuesday morning found 14 pounds of heroin in a vehicle on Interstate 70. Snowball-wielding hooligans damage Steamboat’s iconic Rabbit Ears Motel sign February 10, 2017, 9:29 am In the wee hours of Feb. 2, a group of six intoxicated hooligans threw snowballs at the Rabbit Ears Motel sign and tried to hoist one of their crew onto the historic sign to take a photo. In the process, they caused more than $2,000 in damage to the iconic neon sign that’s been guiding tourists since the 1950s.
